CustomField.description: When checked, the Vendor should be considered the "Preffered Vendor". Best practice would be to limit the "Preffered Vendor" attribute to one Vendor per Vendor Category defined for an Event. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Vendor should be considered the "Preffered Vendor". Best practice would be to limit the "Preffered Vendor" attribute to one Vendor per Vendor Category defined for an Event. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Preferred Vendor
